name: Undervald Defile
description: Bosun Markus Boehr calls the place "Toxic Island", and the name might have fit like a corrupt, poisonous, and slightly singed glove if some cartographer lost to history hadn't already hit upon "Undervald Defile". Suffused with conflicting frequencies of umbral, terra, and blaze aether, it's a place rich in rare resources but equally rich in ways to die.

island_events.name: Aether Surge
island_events.description: Aether surges are a common occurrence across the Hunting Grounds, attracting powerful Behemoths and other hostile creatures.

island_events.name: Toxic Behavior
island_events.description: Behemoths have been infected with poisonous terra aether, making their attacks toxic.

island_events.name: High Alert
island_events.description: Extremely powerful Behemoths pose an even greater threat to the island's ecosystem. Slay it quickly.

journal_entries.name: Tiefland's Best
journal_entries.description: These supplies and trade goods have all spoiled for the most part, but were once bound for the Regent of Ramsgate if the labels are any indication. It's too bad the contents have probably gone offâ€”Tiefland is known as the bread basket of the Shattered Isles, and the Regent is known for having exquisite taste.
